Question.Subject: how to find similar websites?
Question.Content: What is the best way to find similar websites?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
1. go to Google Advanced Search: http://www.google.com/advanced_search
2. click on "Date, usage rights, numeric range, and more"
3. use "Find pages similar to the page"
If you have Firefox there is a nice add-on called SimilarWeb: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/10548
:)

Answer.Content:
1. go to Google Advanced Search: http://www.google.com/advanced_search
2. click on "Date, usage rights, numeric range, and more"
3. use "Find pages similar to the page"
If you have Firefox there is a nice add-on called SimilarWeb: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/10548
